channel.title: Noobscape v3 new items crash
channel.description:
i was running noobscape v3 offline, and decided to add the new halloween masks, legendary pk axe, party hats and dragon items. when i opened my bank, the game just froze without the bank window opening. the new certs added to noobscape work fine, well, i think most of them at least. the only new item i got to work other than certs was the black party hat.
anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Noobscape v3 new items crash
item.dc:creator: @slaveofmen slaveofmen

[quote=“stEps, post:11, topic:547936”]ok I will go out of my way even further to help you, but keep in mind you actually have to read.
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363007.0.html[/quote]

item.title: Noobscape v3 new items crash
item.dc:creator: @stEps stEps
item.description:
@stEps wrote:

[quote=“slaveofmen, post:6, topic:547936”][quote author=stEps link=topic=666840.msg4459009#msg4459009 date=1416509140]
there is plenty of tutorials on here leo. try and utilize the search button for these forums.
[/quote]
ay matt, dont get sore just because i quit your server. im asking specifically, how to conver the itemsdef.xml into the items.rscd i unarchived the items.rscd, and pasted the contents of the itemdef.xml, into it. but now idk how to tuer it back to rscd. i tried just adding the extension .rscd, and the client freezes at “unpacking configuration” then i tried recompressing the file i edited, and then added .rscd extension. any ideas? im on a mac, so idk how to compile and compress with rsc tools. if there isnt any other way, mabey someone who has the fixed file has it for download.[/quote]
lol believe me when I say this- I could care less if you play the server or not. What I guess I should have said is that this question has been answered multiple times on this website and if you use the search button then you will definitely find your answer you seek.

Read full topic

item.title: Noobscape v3 new items crash
item.dc:creator: @slaveofmen slaveofmen
item.description:
@slaveofmen wrote:

cleako:

Use 7zip to update the .rscd archive with the modified .xml file.

tried it the way you said, so how to i put it in xml to rscd fle format?

Read full topic

item.title: Noobscape v3 new items crash

item.description:
@cleako wrote:

Use 7zip to update the .rscd archive with the modified .xml file.

item.title: Noobscape v3 new items crash
item.dc:creator: @slaveofmen slaveofmen
item.description:
@slaveofmen wrote:

so just make the build xml the same as the client as with the server? or is it some other way? like the item def

Read full topic

item.title: Noobscape v3 new items crash
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

Specifically, the item definition cache files should match between what the server has and what the client has or it will not be able to display what one knows and the other does not.

Read full topic

item.title: Noobscape v3 new items crash
item.dc:creator: @stEps stEps
item.description:
@stEps wrote:

you need to be sure that your items.rscd and itemDef.xml are the same.

Read full topic
